name: stanislav-web/octopussy
description: The site visitors grabber. Build in Phalcon & MongoDb

suggest.stanislav-web/zf2-websocket-server-facto: ZF2 WebSockets. You can organize a chat, monitor live site visit, you can create real-time statistics and save it to DB (MySQL, Mongo..etc), you can organize the postal service in the likeness of Google. Yes, anything!
suggest.stanislav-web/phalcon-searcher: Phalcon Database Searcher. This is the search service is designed to search multiple SQL tables. Convenient to use autocomplete, search documents, search the whole site.
suggest.stanislav-web/phalcon-ulogin: Phalcon ULogin. The authorization form uLogin through social networks
suggest.stanislav-web/phalcon-uploader: Phalcon files uploader. Handling and downloading files for Phalcon projects. Allowed multiple files download, filters etc...
suggest.stanislav-web/phalcon-translate: Phalcon Translate Service. Simple way to translate your costom part of templates :-)
